title: How to Use Plugins With ChatGPT

steps.title: Go to https://chatgpt.com/ in a web browser and log in.
steps.content: Go to https://chatgpt.com/ in a web browser and log in. You'll need an OpenAI account to use ChatGPT , so be sure to create an account if you don't have one already. You must have access to ChatGPT-4 , which requires a ChatGPT Plus subscription .

steps.title: Click ••• .
steps.content: Click ••• . You can find this in the bottom-left corner, next to your email address.

steps.title: Click Settings.
steps.content: Click Settings . This will be underneath My plan .

steps.title: Click Beta features.
steps.content: Click Beta features . This is the tab underneath General .

steps.title: Toggle on "Plugins".
steps.content: Toggle on "Plugins". This will enable plugins with ChatGPT.

steps.title: Start a new chat.
steps.content: Start a new chat. Click the + New Chat button in the top-left corner.

steps.title: Hover over "GPT-4".
steps.content: Hover over "GPT-4". You can find this at the top. A pop-up menu will open.

steps.title: Click Plugins.
steps.content: Click Plugins . This will be below Default . You should see a drop-down menu.

steps.title: Click the drop-down menu and select "Plugin store."
steps.content: Click the drop-down menu and select "Plugin store." This will open OpenAI's Plugin store. You can browse the available third-party plugins to use with ChatGPT-4. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Click Install next to a plugin.
steps.content: Click Install next to a plugin. This should take a few seconds. For the best experience, download no more than three (3) plugins at a time. Return to the chat page when you're finished.

steps.title: Enter a prompt that relates to the downloaded plugins.
steps.content: Enter a prompt that relates to the downloaded plugins. For example, if you downloaded the OpenTable and Instacart plugins, you can ask ChatGPT to list the ingredients for a simple recipe (using OpenTable) and order them (using Instacart).

steps.title: Send the prompt.
steps.content: Send the prompt. Click the airplane icon or press Enter on your keyboard. ChatGPT-4 should generate a response using the downloaded plugins if relevant to your prompt. If you want to uninstall a plugin, return to the Plugin store and click Uninstall next to the plugin.

steps.title: Start a new chat.
steps.content: Start a new chat. Click the + New Chat button in the top-left corner.

steps.title: Select the "Code Interpreter" Model.
steps.content: Select the "Code Interpreter" Model. Hover over "GPT-4" at the top and click the Model drop-down menu. Click Code Interpreter .

steps.title: Enter a prompt.
steps.content: Enter a prompt. You can ask ChatGPT-4 to solve quantitative and qualitative math problems, generate data analysis and visualization, and even convert image files to different formats. Here are some prompts you can give Code Interpreter: "Plot function 1/sin(x)" Upload a .csv file and ask, "What are the columns of this dataset?" Upload a .csv file and ask, "Create some basic visualization charts." Upload a logo and ask, "make this 5x smaller" or "make this image grayscale."

steps.title: Click Regenerate response if necessary.
steps.content: Click Regenerate response if necessary. If ChatGPT-4 freezes , you may need to regenerate the response. Keep in mind you'll still have the 50 message limit for ChatGPT-4, so use each prompt wisely.
